content: to gauge needle next round knit resolving any double sts as you come to them now work gsrs while also increasing at the raglan markers as follows 32 sts increase d 112 116 116 120 120 124 128 128 128 sts gsr 1 knit to 1 st before first raglan marker m1r k1 sm k1 38 40 42 46 48 50 52 52 54 sts each front/back 18 m1l knit across sleeve sts until 1 st before next marker m1r 18 16 14 12 12 12 12 10 sts each sleeve k1 sm k1 m1l k2 turn work 4 sts increase d work raglan shaping gsr 2 gsr purl to bor m slipping the raglan markers as you come to them sm purl to 1 st before raglan marker round 1 *knit until 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l m1rp p1 sm p1 m1lp purl across sleeve sts until 1 st before repeat from * 3 more times knit to bor m 8 sts increase d 120 124 next raglan marker m1rp p1 sm p1 m1lp p2 turn work 4 124 128 128 132 136 136 136 sts sts increase d round 2 knit gsr 3 gsr knit to bor m slipping raglan markers as you repeat last 2 rnds 17 19 21 22 24 26 28 31 33 more times come to them sm knit to 1 st before first raglan marker m1r ending with round 2 k1 sm k1 m1l knit across sleeve sts until 1 st before next 136 152 168 176 192 208 224 248 264 sts increase d 256 marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l knit to previous gsr knitting 276 292 304 320 340 360 384 400 sts the double st k2 turn work 4 sts increase d 74 80 86 92 98 104 110 116 122 sts each back and front 54 58 60 60 62 66 means without written permission p 3 divide for body and sleeves note with the exception of the bor m remove all other m as you come to them on next round beginning at bor m knit across back sts place sleeve sts on holder co 6 8 10 12 14 16 20 22 22 sts for underarm using the backward-loop method knit across front sts place next sleeve sts on holder co 6 8 10 12 14 16 20 22 22 sts for underarm using the backward-loop method work across remaining back sts 160 176 192 208 224 240 260 280 288 sts remain for body body continuing in the round work even in stockinette st until piece measures 11 5 / 29cm from underarm or desired body length less 2 / 5cm for the hem change to ribbing needle and k 1
